titles: The Granadiers loyal health A song.
publisher: Printed for J. Dean, in Cranborn-Street, in Leicester-Fields near Newport-House,
notes: Identified both as Wing G1485 (reel 1551) and Wing G1934A (reel 1794) on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproductions of the original in the Harvard University Library.
